author: Giorgio Mendoza
description: HydraSDR RFOne is a USB software-defined radio receiver capable of capturing up to 10 MHz of bandwidth across a continuous range from 24 MHz to 1.8 GHz. It includes open-source firmware and is described as targeting professionals, researchers, and enthusiasts. A user on Twitter shared the product brief for the board, which states that it […]
title: HydraSDR RFOne Preview Highlights Extensible SDR Design with Open Firmware
